name: Pending Discharge
description: Advance notification of a planned patient discharge when the patient has not yet left the healthcare facility
businessPurpose: Notify systems of a planned patient discharge to allow preparation for discharge medications, appointments, and care transitions
timing: Sent before the actual discharge occurs to provide advance notice for preparation
realWorldScenarios: Home health services coordination for patient arrival
Extended care facility notification of incoming patient
Discharge planning team preparation for care transition

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - discharge preparation requires accurate timing and disposition information
